original_solution_mapping.L1: Hammond's statues weighed 80 - 22 = <<80-22=58>>58 pounds after the discarded marble was carved off.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Minus the first statue, the statues weighed 58 - 10 = <<58-10=48>>48 pounds.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Minus the second statue, the statues weighed 48 - 18 = <<48-18=30>>30 pounds.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5224.
    Returns: the weight of each of the remaining statues.
    """
    # L1
    initial_block_weight = 80 # an 80-pound block of marble
    discarded_marble_weight = 22 # weighed 22 pounds
    weight_after_discard = initial_block_weight - discarded_marble_weight

    # L2
    first_statue_weight = 10 # The first statue he carved weighed 10 pounds
    weight_after_first_statue = weight_after_discard - first_statue_weight

    # L3
    second_statue_weight = 18 # The second statue weighed 18
    weight_of_remaining_two_statues = weight_after_first_statue - second_statue_weight

    # L4
    number_of_remaining_statues = 2 # The remaining two statues
    weight_per_remaining_statue = weight_of_remaining_two_statues / number_of_remaining_statues

    # FA
    answer = weight_per_remaining_statue
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Hammond's statues weighed {initial_block_weight} - {discarded_marble_weight} = <<{initial_block_weight}-{discarded_marble_weight}={weight_after_discard}>>{weight_after_discard} pounds after the discarded marble was carved off.

Minus the first statue, the statues weighed {weight_after_discard} - {first_statue_weight} = <<{weight_after_discard}-{first_statue_weight}={weight_after_first_statue}>>{weight_after_first_statue} pounds.

Minus the second statue, the statues weighed {weight_after_first_statue} - {second_statue_weight} = <<{weight_after_first_statue}-{second_statue_weight}={weight_of_remaining_two_statues}>>{weight_of_remaining_two_statues} pounds.

The remaining two statues weighed the same amount, so each weighed {weight_of_remaining_two_statues} / {number_of_remaining_statues} = <<{weight_of_remaining_two_statues}/{number_of_remaining_statues}={weight_per_remaining_statue}>>{weight_per_remaining_statue} pounds.
